Prerequisite: 11th level, rogue, trained in Acrobatics

Benefit: When you charge, each square of your movement need not bring you closer to the target of your charge, but you must start the charge at least 3 squares away from the target.

Update (6/14/2010)

Replace the feat's Benefit entry with the following text: "When you charge, each square of your movement need not bring you closer to the target of your charge, but you must start the charge at least 3 squares away from the target."

Published in Martial Power, page(s) 144.
